'''Jinyou'''{{Lang|zh=晋优|zh_rm=Jìnyōu}} is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the [[Teyvat]] storyline [[Archon Quests]], Chapter II, Prologue: [[Autumn Winds, Scarlet Leaves]].

He is one of the competitors in [[The Crux Clash]], and is the first opponent of the [[Traveler]] during the qualifiers.

==Gameplay==
The player fights Jinyou during the Clash with the Traveler as the sole party member (and without Elemental Skill/Burst). Jinyou has the same moveset as the [[Treasure Hoarders: Scout]].
